name: Golden Goose
description: The world's largest cryptocurrency mining center and global cryptocurrency exchange project that uses Paraguay's cheap and clean electricity. The Golden Goose team has procured a 250,000mÂ² site for the world's largest mining center and a 500MW substation near the Itaipu Hydro Power Plant in Ciudad del Este, Paraguay, which is the largest clean energy producer in the world as well as low and reliable rates for electricity.
